price: 33.Nabiyow Nummah ama koros koo dirabboysak kok ittam koo Rookissam Naaxigeh, tokkel diggah usun dirabboysaanam koo hinna, kinnih immay daalimiinih yan mari dirabboysaah yangaddcem Yallih Aayootay ku-Numma tascasse kinni cirdih (Qinaadi kinnuk).
arabic: قَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَحۡزُنُكَ ٱلَّذِي يَقُولُونَۖ فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُكَذِّبُونَكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qad naʿlamu innahu layaḥzunuka alladhī yaqūlūna fa-innahum lā yukadhibūnaka walākinna al-ẓālimīna biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
